title: 2017 Worlds Semi final and Grand Final Tickets..
body:
Is there a way to know when the Semi final and Grand final for the 2017 Worlds event are going on sale?
Because flights, visa and accommodation have already been purchased and arranged but the ticket sales seem to
be somewhat of a hassle..
All information seems to be unavailable or delayed...
Some assurances would be rather welcomed as a lot of planning has gone into this trip and would be a real
shame if we cant obtain the tickets for the actual Worlds Semi and Grand final that lead to the planning for this trip.
